المستخرج على جهته وباللّه قسم الحالف لي
إنّي في إضاقة عظيمة لولا لو دلك لا لما
صايفت ضايقت غلامه في هذا المقدار وأمّا
قوله أن رسم الكرم عين غير رسم الحكم
فالأمر أقرب من هذا وقد مضى الى
طحا يجيني بشي لي هناك بأي وقت ورد
أنفذت إليه الدّينارين ولم أوحرها
عنه سمعا وطاعة لأمره إن شا اللّه
توكّلت على اللّه

Bei Gott, die Umstände haben mir (das Schicksal) zugeteilt, The copy of the letter which has been sent to its place (?), and by God, it is the oath of him who swears (i.e. I'm swearing), The (letter) which has been sent to its place (?) And he who has taken the oath has taken it in the name of God.
daß ich in einer riesengroßen finanziellen Schwierigkeit bin. Wenn dies nicht wäre, I am in great affliction. If it was not for that (affliction), I would not Verily, I am in great affliction because of being that man's friend, when
hätte ich seinem (sc. des Adressaten) Burschen nicht solche Schwierigkeiten wegen dieses Betrages gemacht. ... have troubled his boy to this extent. And as to I hired his mate for the summer in this space of time. And as to
his saying "the tax on the vines is the same as the regular tax",
now the matter is nearer (more probable) than this. He has already departed to
Ṭaḥâ, to bring me what appertains there to me. As soon as he has arrived ... Wann auch immer er ankommt,
I paid to him the two dînârs, and I never withheld it werde ich ihm (sc. dem Schreiber von recto) die zwei Dinar übersenden und sie ihm nicht vorenthalten,
from him. I hear and obey his order, if God wills. indem ich seinem (sc. des Adressaten) Befehl unverzüglich gehorche. ...
I trust in God.
